eyes: Unrevealed (as Baron Skullfire); Flaming red (as Ghost Rider)
groupaffiliation: Former partner of Marinette Bwa Chech and leader of the Phantom Riders of the Congo
hair: Black goatee (as Baron Skullfire); None (as Ghost Rider)
powers: It can be assumed Baron Skullfire possessed all the powers given to every Spirit of Vengeance, including shooting powerful fireballs from his hands
significantissues: Met Blaze and prepared for war against Ketch and the Black Host (Ghost Rider #31, 2009)
Fought and died at the hands of one of the Black Host (Ghost Rider #32, 2009)
Reborn in Heaven to fight Zadkiel and the forces of Satan (Ghost Riders: Heaven's On Fire #6, 2010)
